channel.title: Life on Yi Yao Tan
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Yi Yao Tan

item.title: Finishing Oxford and Entering a State of Indefinite Homeless
item.description: This year in brief Today I start a period of indefinitely homelessness, staying at a friend’s place at Oxford, in a couple weeks with another friend in Hanover, perhaps beginning of September in Estonia, and then back for my thesis defense mid-September and then to who knows where else. Perhaps this is the sort of thing you embrace at 23. Recently, I’ve been finishing up my thesis for Master’s degree in Mathematics and Foundations of Computer Science at Oxford.
